data.name: SqlFindUsersByEmail
data.value: ;with Users as ( Select ROW_NUMBER() Over (Order By m.UserId) As Row, p.[userId] UserId From [UserProfile] p inner join [webpages_Membership] m on m.UserId=p.[UserId] Where p.[email] like '%'+@2+'%' ) Select (Select COUNT(*) From Users) Total, p.[userId] UserId, [userName] UserName, m.[IsConfirmed] IsConfirmed, m.[lastPasswordFailureDate] LastPasswordFailureDate, m.[PasswordFailuresSinceLastSuccess] PasswordFailuresSinceLastSuccess, m.[createDate] creationDate, m.[passwordChangedDate] PasswordChangedDate, p.[email] Email From Users u inner join [UserProfile] p on u.UserId = p.[UserId] inner join [webpages_Membership] m on m.UserId=p.[UserId] Where u.Row Between @0 AND @1 Order By p.[UserId]

data.name: SqlFindUsersByName
data.value: ;with Users as ( Select ROW_NUMBER() Over (Order By m.UserId) As Row, p.[userId] UserId From [UserProfile] p inner join [webpages_Membership] m on m.UserId=p.[UserId] Where p.[userName] like '%'+@2+'%' ) Select (Select COUNT(*) From Users) Total, p.[userId] UserId, [userName] UserName, m.[IsConfirmed] IsConfirmed, m.[lastPasswordFailureDate] LastPasswordFailureDate, m.[PasswordFailuresSinceLastSuccess] PasswordFailuresSinceLastSuccess, m.[createDate] creationDate, m.[passwordChangedDate] PasswordChangedDate, p.[email] Email From Users u inner join [UserProfile] p on u.UserId = p.[UserId] inner join [webpages_Membership] m on m.UserId=p.[UserId] Where u.Row Between @0 AND @1 Order By p.[UserId]

data.name: SqlGetAllUsers
data.value: ;with Users as ( Select ROW_NUMBER() Over (Order By m.UserId) As Row, p.[userId] UserId From [UserProfile] p inner join [webpages_Membership] m on m.UserId=p.[UserId] ) Select (Select COUNT(*) From Users) Total, p.[userId] UserId, [userName] UserName, m.[IsConfirmed] IsConfirmed, m.[lastPasswordFailureDate] LastPasswordFailureDate, m.[PasswordFailuresSinceLastSuccess] PasswordFailuresSinceLastSuccess, m.[createDate] creationDate, m.[passwordChangedDate] PasswordChangedDate, p.[email] Email From Users u inner join [UserProfile] p on u.UserId = p.[UserId] inner join [webpages_Membership] m on m.UserId=p.[UserId] Where u.Row Between @0 AND @1 Order By p.[UserId]

data.name: SqlGetUser
data.value: Select 0 Total, p.[userId] UserId, p.[userName] UserName, m.[IsConfirmed] IsConfirmed, m.[lastPasswordFailureDate] LastPasswordFailureDate, m.[PasswordFailuresSinceLastSuccess] PasswordFailuresSinceLastSuccess, m.[createDate] creationDate, m.[passwordChangedDate] PasswordChangedDate, p.[email] Email From [UserProfile] p inner join [webpages_Membership] m on m.UserId=p.[UserId] Where UPPER(p.[userName]) = UPPER(@0)

data.name: sqlGetUserById
data.value: Select 0 Total, p.[userId] UserId, [userName] UserName, m.[IsConfirmed] IsConfirmed, m.[lastPasswordFailureDate] LastPasswordFailureDate, m.[PasswordFailuresSinceLastSuccess] PasswordFailuresSinceLastSuccess, m.[createDate] creationDate, m.[passwordChangedDate] PasswordChangedDate, p.[email] Email From [UserProfile] p inner join [webpages_Membership] m on m.UserId=p.[UserId] Where p.[userId] = @0

data.name: sqlGetUserNameByEmail
data.value: Select p.[userName] UserName From [UserProfile] p inner join [webpages_Membership] m on m.UserId=p.[userId] Where p.[email] = @0

data.name: sqlUnlockUser
data.value: Update m Set PasswordFailuresSinceLastSuccess = 0, LastPasswordFailureDate = null From UserProfile p inner join webpages_Membership m on m.UserId = p.[userId] Where p.[userName] = @0
